column5: Even at the risk of boring a few folks, RSM did ask whether or not there were similar laws to Ontario's laws for alcohol consumption in a boat. I posed the question to Quebec authorities and their response follows: "In Quebec, there is no law regarding the consumption of alcoholic beverages in boats except the Canadian Criminal code. On that matter, I will refer you to the Canadian Coast Guard section on boating safety: http://www.ccg-gcc.gc.ca/obs-bsn/sbg-gsn/main_e.htm and more precisely this page on boating and alcohol: http://www.ccg-gcc.gc.ca/obs-bsn/sbg-gsn/alcohol_e.htm"
